title: Sherry Martini
full_text:
Sherry Martini
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
gin
1
ounce
fino or manzanilla
sherry
Small strip of Spanish ham or
lemon twist
, for garnish (optional; see note)
Directions
In a mixing glass, combine gin and sherry and fill with ice. Stir well until chilled, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with ham or lemon twist, if using. Serve.
Notes
This complex martini needs no garnish, but a sliver of Spanish ham is a nice touch, as is a lemon twist.
Special Equipment
Mixing glass,
cocktail strainer
